title: L-valued integration
authors: Xingni Jiang and Jan Harm van der Walt and Marten Wortel
abstract:
We develop integration theory for integrating functions taking values into a
Dedekind complete unital $f$-algebra $\mathbb{L}$ with respect to
$\mathbb{L}$-valued measures. We then discuss and prove completeness results of
$\mathbb{L}$-valued $L^p$-spaces.
